title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in dynamic text items and data/text items is different.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Retrieve datetime values from a table. 2. Display the values in a dynamic text item and a data/text item. 3. Compare the formats of the displayed datetime values in both items.
